story.Text: STEP 1: Hi! We are going for a treasure hunt. Treasure is very close to the bird. Let's get started...
Step 2: First of all check whether you have plugged the base module to the main module. You should be able to see 'Wheels' module under 'I Have' column.
STEP 3: Bird needs to turn right to see the treasure. Drag and drop 'Turn Right' block.
Congratulations!!! You have completed Challenge - 1 successfully!
